definition: capercaillie (Lagopus, several species)/thunderbird (in native American mythology)
bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
(bird species of China) rock ptarmigan (Lagopus muta)
(bird species of China) willow ptarmigan (Lagopus lagopus)

sentences.english: The new Thunderbird also has a very cool filtered search system.
sentences.chinese: 新雷鳥還擁有一個非常棒的過濾搜索系統。

sentences.english: What is your intent of Thunderbirds and THE LIONS in the poem?
sentences.chinese: 詩提到中的雷鳥和《獅子》的意圖是什麼呢？
